actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 16 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964, relating to the special needs of the elderly and handicapped.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to permit up to 20 percent of the funds allocated to make grants and loans to private nonprofit corporations and associations for the purpose of assisting them in providing transportation services for elderly and handicapped persons to be used to meet operating expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 16 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964, relating to the special needs of the elderly and handicapped.
